resources.string: start and stop the anonymous data connection
Tor is an anonymous data network that makes it difficult for Internet usage to be tracked.

This product is produced independently from the TorÂ® anonymity software and carries no guarantee from The Tor Project about quality, suitability or anything else. For more information regarding Tor visit https://www.torproject.org
Allows the application to start and stop the Tor anonymous data connection. This could be used to restrict your access to the anonymous connection.
